attribute.name: allowLinking
attribute.description: Allow symlinking to outside the webapp root directory, if the webapp is an exploded directory

attribute.name: cacheMaxSize
attribute.description: Maximum cache size in KB

attribute.name: cacheTTL
attribute.description: Time interval in ms between cache refeshes

attribute.name: cachingAllowed
attribute.description: Should we cache static resources for this webapp

attribute.name: caseSensitive
attribute.description: Should case sensitivity checks be performed

attribute.name: children
attribute.description: Object names of all children

attribute.name: cookies
attribute.description: Should we attempt to use cookies for session id communication?

attribute.name: compilerClasspath
attribute.description: The compiler classpath to use

attribute.name: crossContext
attribute.description: Should we allow the ServletContext.getContext() method to access the context of other web applications in this server?

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

attribute.name: defaultWebXml
attribute.description: Location of the default web.xml resource or file

attribute.name: deploymentDescriptor
attribute.description: String deployment descriptor

attribute.name: docBase
attribute.description: The document root for this web application

attribute.name: endpointAddresses
attribute.description: An array of URL addresses defined in this Web Module to invoke web services endpoints implementations

attribute.name: engineName
attribute.description: Name of the engine domain, if different from the context domain

attribute.name: environments
attribute.description: MBean Names of the set of defined environment entries for this web application

attribute.name: eventProvider
attribute.description: Event provider support for this managed object

attribute.name: hasWebServices
attribute.description: True if the web module implements web services endpoints

attribute.name: javaVMs
attribute.description: The Java virtual machines on which this module is running

attribute.name: managerChecksFrequency
attribute.description: The frequency of the manager checks (expiration and passivation)

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Name of the web module

attribute.name: objectName
attribute.description: Object name of the web module

attribute.name: override
attribute.description: The DefaultContext override flag for this web application

attribute.name: path
attribute.description: The context path for this Context

attribute.name: privileged
attribute.description: Access to tomcat internals

attribute.name: reloadable
attribute.description: The reloadable flag for this web application

attribute.name: resourceNames
attribute.description: MBean Names of all the defined resource references for this application.

attribute.name: server
attribute.description: The J2EE Server this module is deployed on

attribute.name: servlets
attribute.description: JSR77 list of servlets

attribute.name: startupTime
attribute.description: Time (in milliseconds) it took to start this context

attribute.name: startTimeMillis
attribute.description: Time (in milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00) when this context was started

attribute.name: processingTimeMillis
attribute.description: Cumulative execution times of all servlets in this context

attribute.name: state
attribute.description: Current state of this component

attribute.name: stateManageable
attribute.description: State management support for this managed object

attribute.name: statisticsProvider
attribute.description: Performance statistics support for this managed object

attribute.name: swallowOutput
attribute.description: Flag to set to cause the system.out and system.err to be redirected to the logger when executing a servlet

attribute.name: tldScanTime
attribute.description: Time spend scanning jars for TLDs for this context

attribute.name: useNaming
attribute.description: Create a JNDI naming context for this application?

attribute.name: valveObjectNames
attribute.description: ObjectNames for the valves associated with this container

attribute.name: welcomeFiles
attribute.description: The welcome files for this context

attribute.name: workDir
attribute.description: The pathname to the work directory for this context

mbean.name: PECoyoteConnector
mbean.description: Implementation of a PE Coyote connector

attribute.name: acceptCount
attribute.description: The accept count for this Connector

attribute.name: address
attribute.description: The IP address on which to bind

attribute.name: algorithm
attribute.description: The certificate encoding algorithm to be used

attribute.name: bufferSize
attribute.description: The input buffer size we should create on input streams

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: clientAuth
attribute.description: Should we require client authentication?

attribute.name: ciphers
attribute.description: Comma-separated list of SSL cipher suites to be enabled

attribute.name: compression
attribute.description: Compression value

attribute.name: connectionLinger
attribute.description: Linger value on the incoming connection

attribute.name: connectionTimeout
attribute.description: Timeout value on the incoming connection

attribute.name: connectionUploadTimeout
attribute.description: Timeout value on the incoming connection during request processing

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

attribute.name: disableUploadTimeout
attribute.description: Should Tomcat ignore setting a timeout for uploads?

attribute.name: enableLookups
attribute.description: The 'enable DNS lookups' flag for this Connector

attribute.name: keystoreFile
attribute.description: Pathname to the key store file to be used

attribute.name: keystorePass
attribute.description: Password for accessing the key store file

attribute.name: keystoreType
attribute.description: Type of keystore file to be used for the server certificate

attribute.name: keyAlias
attribute.description: Alias name of this connector's keypair and supporting certificate chain

attribute.name: maxKeepAliveRequests
attribute.description: Maximum number of Keep-Alive requests to honor per connection

attribute.name: maxPostSize
attribute.description: Maximum size in bytes of a POST which will be handled by the servlet API provided features

attribute.name: maxProcessors
attribute.description: The maximum number of processors allowed

attribute.name: minProcessors
attribute.description: The minimum number of processors to start at initialization time

attribute.name: maxSpareThreads
attribute.description: The maximum number of unused request processing threads

attribute.name: maxThreads
attribute.description: The maximum number of request processing threads to be created

attribute.name: minSpareThreads
attribute.description: The number of request processing threads that will be created

attribute.name: minProcessors
attribute.description: The minimum number of processors to start at initialization time

attribute.name: port
attribute.description: The port number on which we listen for ajp13 requests

attribute.name: protocol
attribute.description: Coyote protocol handler in use

attribute.name: protocolHandlerClassName
attribute.description: Coyote Protocol handler class name

attribute.name: proxyName
attribute.description: Ther Server name to which we should pretend requests to this Connector

attribute.name: proxyPort
attribute.description: Ther Server port to which we should pretend requests to this Connector

attribute.name: redirectPort
attribute.description: The redirect port for non-SSL to SSL redirects

attribute.name: scheme
attribute.description: Protocol name for this Connector (http, https)

attribute.name: secure
attribute.description: Is this a secure (SSL) Connector?

attribute.name: sslProtocol
attribute.description: SSL protocol variant to be used

attribute.name: sslProtocols
attribute.description: Comma-separated list of SSL protocol variants to be enabled

attribute.name: tcpNoDelay
attribute.description: Should we use TCP no delay?

attribute.name: tomcatAuthentication
attribute.description: Should Tomcat perform all authentications?

attribute.name: xpoweredBy
attribute.description: Is generation of X-Powered-By response header enabled/disabled?

mbean.name: RequestInfo
mbean.description: Structure holding the Request and Response objects

attribute.description: Flag to set to cause the system.out and system.err to be redirected to the logger when executing a servlet
